thread.title: Jonathon Wright

author: Jonathon Wright
title: Jonathon Wright
text:
4 minutes to book a car. Contact by phone if a problem and you get someone to assist straight away.
Only doubt was the insurance offered as the rental companies obviously don't like it, and you have to leave a deposit as well. However I've just clicked for supercover and it says no deposit necessary. We'll see!
Anyway, really easy, and the "rental" amount was â‚¬10 cheaper than any other!
.
